mapper.select: SELECT distinct on (i.id) i.id, i.nombre as nombreIniciativa, i.descripcion, i.fechaInicio, i.area, i.estado, i.usuario_id, ts.status as status, pc.word, u.id idUsuario, u.tid tidUsuario, u.nombre, u.correo, u.telefono, u.rol, u.estado, FROM Iniciativa as i, Key_words as pc, word_initiative as wi, type_status as ts, "Usuario" as u where kw.id=wi.Key_words_id and ts.status = i.type_status_id and i.user_id = u.id and wi.initiative_id = i.id;
